title: Cyclone Zircon Project
text: The Cyclone Zircon Project is a large <a href="mineral%20sands">mineral sands</a> deposit located in the <a href="Eucla%20Basin">Eucla Basin</a> in <a href="Western%20Australia">Western Australia</a>, near the border with <a href="South%20Australia">South Australia</a>. Cyclone represents one of the largest <a href="zirconium">zirconium</a> reserves in <a href="Australia">Australia</a> having estimated reserves of 98 million tonnes of ore grading 0.95% <a href="zirconium">zirconium</a> metal.
